languages.text: Enemies {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by the character with a melee attack must pass a Willpower {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or make the character their {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} until the start of the character's next turn.
languages.original_text: Противники, получившие {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадание{/g} от персонажа в ближнем бою, должны пройти проверку Воли на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g}. В случае провала персонаж становится для них {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}приоритетной целью{/g} до начала своего следующего хода.

traits.locale_text: Enemies hit by the character with a melee attack must make a Willpower resistance test, or make the character their priority target until the start of the character's next turn.
Enemies hit by the character with a melee attack must pass a Willpower resistance test or make the character their priority target until the start of the character's next turn.

Enemies {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by the character with a melee attack must pass a Willpower {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or make the character their {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} until the start of the character's next turn.

languages.text: Los enemigos {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}alcanzados{/g} por el personaje con un {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ataque cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} deben superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} o convertir al personaje en su {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}objetivo prioritario{/g} hasta el principio del siguiente {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del personaje.
languages.original_text: Enemies {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by the character with a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or make the character their {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} until the start of the character's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Los enemigos {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}alcanzados{/g} por el personaje con un {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ataque cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} deben superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} o convertir al personaje en su {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}objetivo prioritario{/g} hasta el principio del siguiente {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del personaje.

languages.text: このキャラクターの{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接攻撃{/g}が{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}した敵は、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}を行わなければならない。失敗した場合、このキャラクターの次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}開始まで、このキャラクターはそれらの相手の{g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}優先ターゲット{/g}となる。
languages.original_text: Enemies {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by the character with a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or make the character their {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} until the start of the character's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: このキャラクターの{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接攻撃{/g}が{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}した敵は、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}を行わなければならない。失敗した場合、このキャラクターの次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}開始まで、このキャラクターはそれらの相手の{g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}優先ターゲット{/g}となる。

languages.text: 所有被该角色{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战攻击{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}的敌人需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}。未能通过抗性检定的敌人会将该角色视为{g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}优先目标{/g}，直到该角色的下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始。
languages.original_text: Enemies {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by the character with a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or make the character their {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} until the start of the character's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 所有被该角色{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战攻击{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}的敌人需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}。未能通过抗性检定的敌人会将该角色视为{g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}优先目标{/g}，直到该角色的下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始。

languages.text: Gegner, die vom Charakter mit einem Nahkampfangriff {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}getroffen{/g} werden, müssen eine Willenskraft-{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} bestehen, oder ihn bis zum Beginn des nächsten Zugs des Charakters zu ihrem {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}Prioritätsziel{/g} machen.
languages.original_text: Enemies {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by the character with a melee attack must pass a Willpower {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or make the character their {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} until the start of the character's next turn.

traits.locale_text: Gegner, die vom Charakter mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfangriff{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}getroffen{/g} werden, müssen eine {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft-{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} bestehen, oder ihn bis zum Beginn der nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Runde{/g} des Charakters zu ihrem {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}Prioritätsziel{/g} machen.

languages.text: Les ennemis {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}touchés{/g} par le personnage lors d'une {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}attaque de mêlée{/g} doivent réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} lié à la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force Mentale{/g} ou faire du personnage leur {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}cible prioritaire{/g} jusqu'au début du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant de ce personnage.
